pkgmetadata.longdescription: ---------------------------------------Lightweight SOAP client (Jurko's fork).--------------------------------------- Based on the original 'suds' project by Jeff Ortel (jortel at redhatdot com) hosted at 'http://fedorahosted.org/suds'. 'Suds' is a lightweight SOAP-based web service client for Pythonlicensed under LGPL (see the LICENSE.txt file included in thedistribution). This is hopefully just a temporary fork of the original suds Pythonlibrary project created because the original project development seemsto have stalled. Should be reintegrated back into the original projectif it ever gets revived again.
